parameters.name: feedback
parameters.description: Whether or not to give feedback 1=yes; 0=no

parameters.name: generateRandom
parameters.description: Whether to use random generation of times. use 0 for equal-spaced values.

parameters.name: randomseed
parameters.description: Fixed seed vs. random seed from timer.

parameters.name: bgcol
parameters.description: Background color.  Can take hundreds of color names; see PEBL Manual appendix.

parameters.name: wallcol
parameters.description: Wall color.  Can take hundreds of color names; see PEBL Manual appendix.

parameters.name: targcol
parameters.description: Target color.  Can take hundreds of color names; see PEBL Manual appendix.
